title: Pac-12
description: The Pac-12 brand is distinguished by its vibrant color palette: a deep navy blue (#004B91), a darker shade of blue (#00274D), a bright sky blue (#0076C0), sleek black (#000007), a lively lime green (#D6E03D), a neutral grey (#A1A1A4), and a soft beige (#E5C5BB). These colors encapsulate the diversity and energy represented by the institutions within the Pac-12 conference. The color specifications are sourced from the Pac-12 Style Guide.
